title: Temporal Coverage
description: A record of a time range represented by the collection's establishment or change over time. This term is separate from the living or geologic periods represented by the objects in the collection.

temporalCoverageType.description: The type or context of the time range associated with the collection's establishment. Separate from the living or geologic periods represented by the objects in the collection.

temporalCoverageEndDate.description: End date of the time range of the collection.

temporalCoverageStartDate.description: Start date of the time range of the collection.

reference.description: One or more References relating to the Temporal Coverage

measurementOrFact.description: One or more Measurement Or Facts relating to the Temporal Coverage
